abstract: International Tennis Federation bars official Denis Pitner for 10 years for working at tournaments without telling organizers he had been suspended from the sport
snippet: The International Tennis Federation barred Denis Pitner, a Croatian official, for 10 years for working at tournaments without telling organizers he had been suspended from the sport.
lead_paragraph: The International Tennis Federation barred Denis Pitner, a Croatian official, for 10 years for working at tournaments without telling organizers he had been suspended from the sport.
